Linkblog

Welcome to my linkblog.

I post all kinds of links about topics including SEO, AI, music, life, and the Web. You can also follow the linkblog via an RSS feed wherever you get your RSS feeds... read?

Feel free to email me if you have any interesting links to share and I might add them in.

  • Password Strength Estimator
    Password Strength Estimator estimates how strong your password is based on how long it'd take to crack by online and offline attacks (throttled and unthrottled)
    05 Jun 2024 | Filed under: techsecurity
  • City In A Bottle – A 256 Byte Raycasting System
    This amazing program uses many different concepts in a very small space, understanding it is kind of like solving a puzzle. There are several main pieces including the html code, frame update loop, rendering system, raycasting engine, and the city itself.
    01 Jun 2024 | Filed under: techJavaScript
  • Billion laughs attack
    In computer security, a billion laughs attack is a type of denial-of-service (DoS) attack which is aimed at parsers of XML documents. It is also referred to as an XML bomb or as an exponential entity expansion attack.
    27 May 2024 | Filed under: tech
  • Solving x^3=8
    Solving x^3=8 and the answer is not just 2. We will need to factor a difference of 2 cubes, use the quadratic formula and imaginary number.
    26 May 2024 | Filed under: mathematics
